Job Description: Job Role:    Candidate will be a key developer in a project team tasked with design and development of innovative and highly scalable products     Minimum Qualifications:     3 years of experience in software product development     Expertise in C/C Programming     Working Experience in 3G stack products      Working Experience in 3GPP UMTS/WCDMA protocols      Working Experience in 3G/4G core network elements HNBGW, SGSN, GGSN, MME, SGW, PGW     Working Experience on SCTP/SCCP/M3UA/RANAP protocols      Working Experience on Linux platform for scalable and highperformance systems     Capability to design scalable and robust systems     Strong self-motivation for solving problems and innovating with intent to improve the customer experience      Strong problem solving and software development/troubleshooting skills      Strong communication and analytical skills     Education:     Bachelor s (B.E/   B.Tech   ) or Master s degree (M.E. or    M.Tech   .) in Electronics / Communication / Computer Science Engineering or equivalent training, education and experience
Functional Area: IT Software - Embedded, EDA, VLSI, ASIC, Chip Design,
UG: B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization, Any Graduate in Any Specialization
